    • getCategorisedTasksFromGarden

      ArrayList<Task> getCategorisedTasksFromGarden(IPerson person, taskCategory category, Garden garden)
      Returns all a user's tasks in a garden with the specified category
      Parameters:
      person - The person who owns the tasks
      category - The category to group the tasks
      garden - The garden that the tasks belong to
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the users tasks in the garden that have the category
